body.name: koorlian Queen Size Mattress, 10 Inch Hybrid Queen Mattress in a Box, 3 Layer Premium Foam with Pocket Springs for Motion Isolation and Pressure Relieving, Medium Firm Feel, 120-Night Trial
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 16 hrs 43 mins
features: 【7 Zones Spring Supportive】The 7 zoned individual encased coils are positioned at the core of the mattress. On top, multi-layers of CertiPUR-US certified comfort foam are laid in place. This hybrid mattress has a certain amount of spring while also conforming to the body for targeted pressure relief, offering a balanced sleep experience for many individuals. Make sure no one is standing at the direction where the mattress is rolling out to prevent any unnecessary injury.

【Medium Firm Mattress with Motion Isolation】This medium firm queen mattress constructed with comfortable memory foam and durable pocket innerspring. These pocket innerspring work independently, so they can absorbed over 90% motion disturbances from your partner. This medium firm mattress perfectly contouring to your body curve from head to toe, bouncy yet supportive,give you a sweet night.

【Memory Foam and Pressure Relief】 This innerspring mattress with Memory foam recovery layer, providing enhanced body contouring , relieving pressure on your back, hip and shoulders, and with breathable top layer also make you sleep Cool all night.

【Queen Size Mattress in a Box】This hybrid queen mattress shipped compressed, rolled, vacuum sealed and delivered in a box, easy and fun to set up. For optimal performance, unroll your mattress allow an extra 48-72 hours for full and proper expansion, in a room temperature setting. New mattresses have a mild scent upon unboxing that will dissipate in a few hours in a well-ventilated room.

【120 RISK-FREE Nights Trial】Sleeping preferences vary from person to person, each Koorlian mattresses comes with 120 RISK-FREE nights trial and covered with 10 years support. You can decide if the spring mattress work well with you. Our expert customer service team will be available to help you through any hesitations, problems or questions you may have.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Not too firm, would say this a more of medium but wonderful for back pain! This is my favorite mattress I’ve ever slept on and the price point is incredible.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Rating based on the addition of a thin inexpensive memory foam topper. Mattress without topper would have been too hard for me, now is firm yet comfortable. Was impressed at construction, number of coil springs and height/thickness for price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: For the price and convenience of Amazon Prime, I would say that I am impressed. I ordered a queen and it expanded fully and is actually comfortable. Note the matress is definitely firm. I am hopeful overtime is will soften a little bit. I would recommend 👌

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Breaks i’m after 30 days
reviews.reviewText: I bought a 14 inch box mattress that i hated because when i woke up i had sunk to the center of the bed. It was literally like sleeping on an air mattress. So i decided to try a 12 inch mattress instead and one with Firm Foam incorporated. I am so glad i found this one. While it seemed a bit firm the first month of sleeping on it it has softened a bit and it the perfect firmness. I suffer from really bad lower back pain because i have been a stomach sleeper my entire life and needed a mattress firm enough it wouldn’t cause my lower back to arch more and one i could also sleep on the side and it wouldn’t be like sleeping on concrete it would still mold to my body a little. I’m glad to say this mattress as helped my back pain immensely and i wake up genuinely refreshed and well rested. It has great quality and was a great buy for the price. I don’t think it had cooling gel in it but somehow is still able to be extremely breathable underneath me when i sleep. i’ve had previous problems with foam mattress keeping me too hot at night and this one does not do that. Love the warranty as well and the 120 night trial since i was a bit skeptical about this mattress but ended up loving it. I was also able to set it up completely alone in my apartment i love that i came all boxed up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Mattress. Great price
reviews.reviewText: We love this mattress. Easy to install, very comfortable and the right amount of firmness. Cannot beat it for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My grandson loved it. Very comfortable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This mattress set up quickly and doesn't smell like chemicals. It is a bit soft. I placed it on a frame, but not a box spring, so that may be a factor. Overall am happy with the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sizing may vary
reviews.reviewText: Summary: Mattress was 74 x 76, smaller than advertisedMy husband and I moved into a house with an extra bedroom. We decided to upgrade our Queen set to a King set and move our old bed suite to have a guest bedroom. Well, the holidays came around and I wanted to host my family, so we bought the mattress and moved our old set even though we had not picked out a new bed frame yet. We ended up just having the mattress on the floor for a few months because we are picky and didn't really like the bed frames that are commonly available. Even being on the floor, it is very comfortable and works for both me and my husband (so far) he tends to need a firmer bed than I do, but we are both enjoying this mattress so far.After using the mattress for several months and enjoying it, we finally found the bedroom suite we wanted! A local guy fabricated solid wood furniture for us that was beyond our expectations compared to everything we saw from the major furniture dealers. then we got it home and put the mattress on it. The mattress was SMALLER than the frame. There was a HUGE gap between the mattress and the foot board. I tried spinning the mattress, because maybe I accidentally put it sideways. NOPE. That made it worse.I measured the frame and the mattress and then measured them again because I was surprised by what I saw. My frame was perfect. 76 in wide by 80 in long. The mattress was 74in by 76 in.... and the was being generous since the corners of a mattress aren't sharp to easily get an exact measurement. To put it in perspective, my toddler had room to walk around and play between the mattress and the foot board.I scooted the mattress down to split the gap between the head board and the foot board. I had to stuff extra pillows between the mattress and the head board so that my pillow doesn't fall out from under me in my sleep. The gap at the foot board is less noticeable, but still scary because my toddler could easily slip between them and get hurt or stuck.
